summary: 14 years old Uwe grows up in a dull multi-storey apartment building in a suburb of Hamburg. His father is an alcoholic and beats his son while he's drunk. Only together with his clique Uwe ... See full summary »
cast: Dschingis Bowakow|Uwe Bohm|Marquard Bohm|Herma Koehn|Katja Bowakow|Ingrid Boje|Günter Lohmann|Gerhard Stöhr|Corinna Schmidt|Goldie Schäfer|Ingeborg Thomson|Ernst Schoof|Albrecht Lüders|Roland Wachs|Rolf Becker
title: Nordsee ist Mordsee
